entries.title: The Small but Mighty Danger of Echo Chamber Extremism
entries.description: Research shows that relatively few people exist in perfectly sealed-off media bubbles—but they’re still having an outsize impact on US politics.

entries.title: My Week With the Future of Garbage Bins
entries.description: A device called Mill from veterans of Nest, the smart-thermostat creator, transforms your would-be kitchen waste into chicken feed.

entries.title: Big Tech Is Playing it Safe on Iran. Workers Are Taking Charge
entries.description: Google and other giants have offered muted support compared to their Ukraine response. Employees are starting anti-censorship projects of their own.
